long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read an article in peace, WITHOUT being distracted by the hijinks of reality stars you've never heard of but feel the strong need to read all about! 

Want to take a break and fall into a blackhole of gossip? Just click the icon to re-enable the sidebar until you've had enough.
